title: NEED MID AND JUNGLER FOR CLASH (Gold/plat)
body:
In desperate need of a mid laner and jungler for clash as both my previous jg and mid aren't available this weekend. 
Need comms and a decent champ pool of relatively meta picks. 

Comment below or add me in game: Dankbanana24

Cheers

replies.body: My jungle duo and I are happy to join :D
